alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Kaibab Plateau; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 1:38PM MST until February 24 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. The period of heaviest accumulation is expected later this afternoon through the overnight hours. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with higher amounts at the highest elevations. Wind gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Doney Park, Flagstaff, Forest Lakes, Fredonia, Heber-Overgaard, Jacob Lake, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Sedona, Seligman, and Williams. * WHEN...Until 8 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 1 PM Today to 8 AM Friday: Doney Park 7 to 11 inches Flagstaff 10 to 16 inches Forest Lakes 7 to 11 inches Fredonia 2 to 4 inches Heber-Overgaard 1 to 3 inches Jacob Lake 4 to 8 inches Prescott 5 to 9 inches Prescott Valley 1 to 3 inches Sedona 1 to 2 inches Seligman 1 to 3 inches Williams 9 to 13 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
